title: UHP Capability Discovery Document
description: Describes the capabilities of a UHP-compliant service.

serviceName.description: The name of the UHP-compliant service.

version.description: The version of the service implementing these capabilities.

capabilities.description: A list of capabilities provided by the service.

id.description: A unique identifier for the capability.

name.description: A human-readable name for the capability.

description.description: A detailed description of what the capability does.

apiEndpoint.description: The URI path for the API endpoint associated with this capability (e.g., /jobs).

httpMethod.description: The HTTP method used to interact with this capability.

requestSchema.description: URI reference to the JSON Schema for the request payload (if applicable).

responseSchema.description: URI reference to the JSON Schema for the response payload (if applicable).
